text:
I looked through the all the published documentation and couldn't find out how 
to set the additivity property of a category through a property file.  Based on 
the information for appenders I thought I should be able to set additivity in 
this manner.  

log4j.category.com.foo.additivity=false
currently it is set by using
log4j.additivity.com.foo=false

this seems very counter intutive based upon the other settings in the system.  
I suggest that you either allow the first setting to set additivity as well, or 
that you more fully document the additivity property setting (in 
manual/javadocs)
creator: ericm@adrenaline.com

text:
Sorry about the confusion but the flag is documented in the ProperyCOnfigurator 
documentation. Ceki
